description:
Hours worked

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
44111 Monthly report on the main construction industry

Definition:
Hours worked are all hours actually worked (not hours paid)
by proprietors, salary earners, wage earners and apprentices
on construction sites, in building yards and workshops.
Hours spent on office work are not included.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2017
name: Hours worked
